overview: Evelyn and Viv, a mother/daughter con artist team, move into an apartment complex hoping to make a profit off of unsuspecting men. But, they are in for a big surprise when what seems like a dead-end complex turns into their greatest financial pay-off yet. However, nothing is at it seems because in the game of conning, it is never fully clear who is taking whom for a ride.
title: The Girls Next Door
